Bash(# 6. Plugin
git add internal/cmd/plugin/disk/ cmd/kubectl-cnpg/main.go &&  git commit -s -m ""$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(plugin\): add kubectl cnpg disk command

Add new ''kubectl cnpg disk'' command for disk status inspection:

internal/cmd/plugin/disk/:
- cmd.go: Main command setup with ''status'' subcommand
- status.go: Display disk usage for cluster instances
- doc.go: Package documentation

Shows per-instance disk usage including:
- Data volume: total, available, percent used
- WAL volume: total, available, percent used \(if separate\)
- Tablespace volumes: usage per tablespace
- Auto-resize status: enabled, last action, budget remaining

Example usage:
  kubectl cnpg disk status cluster-example

Output format matches other cnpg plugin commands with
table-based display and optional JSON/YAML output.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)"")
Bash(then echo "✓ $hash $msg" else echo "✗ $hash $msg \(missing sign-off\)" fi done)
Bash(then echo "✓ $hash - has Claude co-author" else echo "✗ $hash - missing Claude co-author" fi done)
